Amplify Learning UI Library

Components

The following is a list of all the example reusable UI components which exist as a part of the Amplify Learning UI Library.

Amplify Dropdown Type 1

Example
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link

        
Code

        <div class="dropdown dropdown-1">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown">
        Action <div class="icon-wrap">
        <span class="icon-arrow-selector">

        </svg>

        </ul>
        </div>

Amplify Dropdown Type 2

Example
  • Action
  • Another action
  • Something else here
  • Separated link

        
Code


        <div class="dropdown dropdown-2">
        <button class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown">
        Dropdown
        </button>
        <ul class="dropdown-menu">
        <li><a href="#">Action</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Another action</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Something else here</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Separated link</a></li>
        </ul>
        </div>

Default Button

Example

      
Code


      <button type="button" class="btn btn-default">NEXT
      <span class="gt">
      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
      <!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.1//EN" "http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/1.1/DTD/svg11.dtd">
      <svg version="1.1" id = "Layer_1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px"
      width="35px" height="20px" viewBox="0 0 35 20" enable-background="new 0 0 35 20" xml:space="preserve" >
      <text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 8.6191 19.6914)" opacity="0.5" font-family="'MyriadPro-Regular'" font-size="36">></text>
      </svg>
      </span>
      </button>

Panel

PRINT OR EXPORT FROM "Phineas Should Have Been Dead"

  • PRINT
  • EXPORT

Select Activities

  • Poll and Pair
  • Writing Prompt

  • Solo

SELECT

  • Folsom, Rima
  • Gregory, Jordan
  • Halperstein, Christianson
  • Ingridson, Felicia

  • Austin, Wanda
  • Bridgeman, Damien
  • Carlinson, Aaron
  • Derocha, Timothy
  • Eagleton, Ariana

  <h3>Panel</h3>
    <div class="example-container">
      <div class="block-info">Example</div>
      <div class="panel panel-default">
        <div class="panel-heading">
          <h3 class="panel-title">PRINT OR EXPORT FROM <span class="actv-
            title">"Phineas Should Have Been Dead"</span></h3>
          </div>
          <div class="panel-body">
            <div class = "bars">
              <ul class="two nav nav-tabs">
                <li class = "active left"><a href="#">PRINT</a></li>
                <li class="inactive right"><a href="">EXPORT</a></li>
              </ul>
            </div>
            <div class = "copts">
              <p>Select Activities</p>
              <ul>
                <li>
                  <div class="chebox"></div>
                  <input type='checkbox' name='thingasd' id="thingasd"/>

                  <span>Vocabulary</span>      
                </li>

                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
